Spending the past three months dining at Whampoa Drive Food Centre has been a truly enjoyable experience. The food was consistently delicious, and the service was warm and welcoming, making each visit something to look forward to.

I‚Äôm sincerely grateful for the quality meals and the friendly atmosphere. It became a place I could rely on for comfort and satisfaction, and I hope to return again in the future.

Thank you once again for the wonderful food and great service.
Long queue most of stalls, good food stalls plentiful. Limited parking lots.
Zi Char stall How Hup serves good grilled sambal sting ray, clams soup and other seafood dishes.
Just reopen with many food stores. Famous duck rice, rojak, fish soup.
